title: Assessment methods
fullText:
The installation shall be assessed in accordance with one of the following:
(a) A basic visual inspection, in accordance with Section 3.
(b) A detailed visual inspection and limited testing, in accordance with Sections 3 and 4.
(c) A detailed visual inspection and full extensive testing, in accordance with Sections 3, 4 and 5.
(d) In New Zealand only; inspection and testing in accordance with Sections 3, 4, 5, and 6.
